name: Baguettes, Please
description:
How to play:
- Sell to each client what they ask for.
- A dough has 2 states which go before becoming a baguette. For it you just have to put it on the table and use the rolling pin over it.
- Each baguette has 5 states which go in this order when on the fires:
   + Baguette dough.
   + Slightly Baked Baguette.
   + Baked Baguette.
   + Slightly Burnt Baguette.
   + Ashes.

- Clients will never ask for ashes.
- Clients can ask for more than 1 baguette.

Made by:

Art: Jens Steenmetz (https://www.behance.net/gallery/71592049/Art-Portfolio-Jens-Steenmetz).
Code: Ángel Ramírez(https://twitter.com/AngelRDev).
